Introduction

Park Joo Hyun is a South Korean singer. She was a member of the Korean Pop girl group SPICA and their sub-unit SPICA.S. In October 2014, she legally changed her name from Park Joo Hyun to Park Si Hyun, a name she's been called since she's a child.
